[CDF-24656] üåç Dump location filter (#1600)

# Description

Support dump of location filters


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/20d79aea-189f-4bf8-af66-e956938731ad)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Support for dumping location filters, `cdf dump
location-filters`. (`cdf dump config location-filters` if the existing
alpha flag `dump-data=true` is set.)

## templates

No changes.
